I love this app because it finds hidden folders that contains GB of junk that clog my phone.  But, there is a bug: whenever I try to scan my /data directory it crashes. I can give more information to debug this if needed, but I need this fixed soon!
replyContent: Hi, this bug is fixed. Please update.

content: Nice looking but won't actually delete files on my sd card...
replyContent: Do you delete from SD or from /system partition?

content: I find this app is ok. However, it loses 1 star for EACH of these issues, which could be fixed with.moderate effort to great effect:  1: NO BLACK theme? Why do devs STILL code like this, especially when they include root capable code?  2+3: database must be rerun on EVERY opening of the app. Would be better to update every [user editable] XX period, and on sd insertion, and even with a Tasker plugin. For reference, see Windows-based "Everything". THAT is AMAZING and what COULD BE DONE with this database.
Every time I delete something it comes right back!! Why can't I delete stuff from my internal memory on my ZTE Z990G
Awesome ui design
The interface is very clean and clear, making it easy to see what I want...!

Very nice both to look at & to use tho as said u can get by with out it...did the upgrade hoping to get all drives up in one widget but no!u gotta put them up one at a time:( loses star for that!also a night theme needed pls tho can't take a star for that lol sum up its a nice tool that's handy for info at a glance!depends on how much ¬£ u got really...their other apps good too but they ain't cheap...miss iOS as the deals were loads better
Great app!

Installed on HTC One X & One M8 , was a little disappointed it doesn't pick up the SD_ext on the M8 but I understand this may be resolved by an update , hope this update comes soon. All in all very good and a nice looking app & widgets may update this to 5 stars once it works on M8.  Update  Works great now on my M8 Thanks , definitely worth 5 stars
replyContent: Please update and report.

content: So far it's GrEaT! Sincerely...julianna

Doesn't pick up external sd card yet but should be fixed with next update. Best storage app out there in my opinion. Needs more options for files though such as moving them to external sd card. Especially additional files for apps that require large files (games).
replyContent: Please update and report.

content: Xperia z1 compact

The items scanned reads 0 and the drive usage tab shows /data/wimax (an HTC partition holding wimax keys) Multiple re-starts and re-installations failed in the app recognizing the proper partition.  To the app developer: if there is any way I can help make this wonderful tool work on my internal storage feel free to contact me.  Partitions shown in recovery are: /boot /cache /data /sdcard /system /wimax  My sdcard is partitioned into 3 mounts, Fat32, ext4 (for link2sd), and a cache partition.
replyContent: Hi Charles, thank you for your feedback. Please send me screenshots, illustrating your mount point locations to my email.

content: Nexus 7 2. widget shows incorrect free storage space after deletion of files. Also I have to keep refreshing to get accurate free space data on charts. Update to 4 stars coz I just got back 3gigs of storage thanks to this app.
replyContent: I`ll test and fix. Thanks for report.

content: Like the app so bought this pro version but it doesn't show any details of SD card on HTC One M8 (android 4.4.2)
replyContent: Please update and report.

content: App is not seeing my microSD card in the new HTC One m8.  Card is mounted and I can play my media files from it.
replyContent: Please send me your microSd card path. I'll fix it.

content: This app is under rated, the widget is my favorite and always on my home screen. A+
Works as expected, beautiful UI. Worth the money.
Dev doesn't respond to bug report via email.

I was getting so tired of data taking up space on my Droid Bionic  main 8gb of storage. I could not understand why. With this handy app I found data in my safestrap that was taking a lot of space. Thanks guys! This is a incredible app and I highly recommend it!!!
Visually, this is the most clear, user friendly and best looking layout of any disk management app I've used.

Amazing effort into the Sunburst chart visualizations, free version works well but is worth paying to support dev & get access to colour palette & additional widgets, could do with a RGB or Hexadecimal selector as well.

I'm somewhat of a tinker on my phone who likes to install new roms and such. Apparently while flashing I left a huge music cache thanks to this app I found and deleted it! Also this app feels like butter!
It's nice looking, but I wish to be able to change size of the memory at will. Great app. Work on it gays
Excellent
Here comes some money
Every time I run this crazy app its spendt long time scanning the device and crashes quite often
Very good

Had reported a silly cosmetic bug but was pleasantly surprised it was immediately placed into the dev cycle and very very quickly. Great app, great support, kudos to the developer. You won't regret if you get the pro version!
replyContent: Thank Shawn for your support!

content: The free version works great for my needs, but I purchased the app to support the developer for building such a great app! Thanks!
Finally i can be able to differentiate thoe good stuffs from the trash, Great!!
Sleek looking well designed
I like it, just wish I knew how to get my videos back after accidentally deleting them.
Great work
Best one I've found for analysing disk usage. Good layout and intuitive.
A must app..
Fast and easy way to clean out large files. Pro features are worth the money.
